api/classes/ZarrCubeProvider.title: ZarrCubeProvider
api/classes/ZarrCubeProvider.description: Provides rendering of volumetric (3D) Zarr datasets as Cesium primitives.

api/classes/ZarrCubeVelocityProvider.title: ZarrCubeVelocityProvider
api/classes/ZarrCubeVelocityProvider.description: Provider responsible for loading and rendering 3D velocity fields (U and V components)

api/classes/ZarrImageryLayer.title: ZarrImageryLayer
api/classes/ZarrImageryLayer.description: Custom Cesium imagery layer for Zarr datasets.

api/classes/ZarrLayerProvider.title: ZarrLayerProvider
api/classes/ZarrLayerProvider.description: Imagery provider for rendering Zarr datasets as Cesium imagery tiles.

api/functions/calculateElevationSlice.title: calculateElevationSlice()
api/functions/calculateElevationSlice.description: Determines the index range of the elevation axis to load from a Zarr cube.

api/functions/calculateHeightMeters.title: calculateHeightMeters()
api/functions/calculateHeightMeters.description: Converts elevation index to Cesium height (meters),

api/functions/calculateNearestIndex.title: calculateNearestIndex()
api/functions/calculateNearestIndex.description: Finds the index of the value in values nearest to target.

api/functions/calculateSliceArgs.title: calculateSliceArgs()
api/functions/calculateSliceArgs.description: Constructs Zarr slice arguments for extracting a subregion of a multidimensional array.

api/functions/calculateXYFromBounds.title: calculateXYFromBounds()
api/functions/calculateXYFromBounds.description: Converts geographic bounds (lat/lon) to pixel-space indices for slicing Zarr arrays.

api/functions/colormapBuilder.title: colormapBuilder()
api/functions/colormapBuilder.description: Builds a color ramp (discrete or continuous) from a specified colormap.

api/functions/colorScaleByName.title: colorScaleByName()
api/functions/colorScaleByName.description: Returns a color scale function for a given colormap name.

api/functions/createColorRampTexture.title: createColorRampTexture()
api/functions/createColorRampTexture.description: Creates a flexible 1D color-ramp texture supporting either normalized (0â€“1)

api/functions/createProgram.title: createProgram()
api/functions/createProgram.description: Creates and links a WebGL program using the specified vertex and fragment shaders.

api/functions/createShader.title: createShader()
api/functions/createShader.description: Creates and compiles a WebGL shader from source code.

api/functions/deriveRectangleAndScheme.title: deriveRectangleAndScheme()
api/functions/deriveRectangleAndScheme.description: Computes a Cesium Rectangle and TilingScheme for a Zarr dataset.

api/functions/detectCRS.title: detectCRS()
api/functions/detectCRS.description: Detects the coordinate reference system (CRS) of a Zarr dataset based on metadata or coordinate range.

api/functions/extractNoDataMetadata.title: extractNoDataMetadata()
api/functions/extractNoDataMetadata.description: Extracts no-data related metadata from a Zarr array's attributes.

api/functions/getCubeDimensions.title: getCubeDimensions()
api/functions/getCubeDimensions.description: Computes cube dimension ordering and strides based on dimension indices.

api/functions/getXYLimits.title: getXYLimits()
api/functions/getXYLimits.description: Retrieve the geographic coordinate limits (min/max latitude/longitude) for a Zarr array.

api/functions/identifyDimensionIndices.title: identifyDimensionIndices()
api/functions/identifyDimensionIndices.description: Identify the indices of common dimensions (lat, lon, time, elevation)

api/functions/initZarrDataset.title: initZarrDataset()
api/functions/initZarrDataset.description: Opens a Zarr variable (single-scale or multiscale pyramid) and prepares its metadata.

api/functions/latDegToMercY.title: latDegToMercY()
api/functions/latDegToMercY.description: Converts a latitude value (in degrees) to Web Mercator Y coordinate (in meters).

api/functions/loadDimensionValues.title: loadDimensionValues()
api/functions/loadDimensionValues.description: Loads the coordinate values for a specific dimension.

api/functions/lonDegToMercX.title: lonDegToMercX()
api/functions/lonDegToMercX.description: Converts a longitude in degrees into a Web Mercator X coordinate (meters).

api/functions/openLevelArray.title: openLevelArray()
api/functions/openLevelArray.description: Opens and caches a specific multiscale level array.

api/functions/resolveNoDataRange.title: resolveNoDataRange()
api/functions/resolveNoDataRange.description: Resolves the no-data value range for masking dataset values.

api/functions/updateImgData.title: updateImgData()
api/functions/updateImgData.description: Updates an ImageData object with a new pixel color

api/functions/validateBounds.title: validateBounds()
api/functions/validateBounds.description: Validates whether geographic bounds are logically consistent.

api/interfaces/ColorMapInfo.title: ColorMapInfo
api/interfaces/ColorMapInfo.description: Structure of the global color map registry.

api/interfaces/ColorScaleProps.title: ColorScaleProps
api/interfaces/ColorScaleProps.description: Describes a numerical-to-color mapping for visualizing scalar fields.

api/interfaces/CubeOptions.title: CubeOptions
api/interfaces/CubeOptions.description: Configuration for a 3D cube visualization (volumetric rendering).

api/interfaces/CubeVelocityProps.title: CubeVelocityProps
api/interfaces/CubeVelocityProps.description: Represents the in-memory structure of a velocity field slice.

api/interfaces/DataSliceProps.title: DataSliceProps
api/interfaces/DataSliceProps.description: Describes a slice of a multidimensional array.

api/interfaces/DimensionNamesProps.title: DimensionNamesProps
api/interfaces/DimensionNamesProps.description: Describes the mapping between dataset dimensions and their standardized names.

api/interfaces/DimensionValues.title: DimensionValues
api/interfaces/DimensionValues.description: Mapping of dimension names to their corresponding coordinate arrays.

api/interfaces/DimIndicesProps.title: DimIndicesProps
api/interfaces/DimIndicesProps.description: Maps dimension keys to their indices and associated coordinate arrays.

api/interfaces/LayerOptions.title: LayerOptions
api/interfaces/LayerOptions.description: Configuration for a 2D raster (image) layer visualization.

api/interfaces/VelocityOptions.title: VelocityOptions
api/interfaces/VelocityOptions.description: Configuration for a vector (velocity) visualization layer.

api/interfaces/XYLimits.title: XYLimits
api/interfaces/XYLimits.description: Describes the XY coordinate boundaries of a dataset.

api/interfaces/XYLimitsProps.title: XYLimitsProps
api/interfaces/XYLimitsProps.description: Alias of XYLimits with explicit type name for Zarr coordinate bounds.

api/interfaces/ZarrLevelMetadata.title: ZarrLevelMetadata
api/interfaces/ZarrLevelMetadata.description: Metadata for a single multiscale level in a Zarr dataset.

api/interfaces/ZarrSelectorsProps.title: ZarrSelectorsProps
api/interfaces/ZarrSelectorsProps.description: Describes a selector for a Zarr dataset dimension.

api/type-aliases/ColorMapName.title: ColorMapName
api/type-aliases/ColorMapName.description: Type representing valid color map names. The values are derived from the

api/type-aliases/SliceArgs.title: SliceArgs
api/type-aliases/SliceArgs.description: Represents a multidimensional slice argument for Zarr array indexing.

api/variables/allColorScales.title: allColorScales
api/variables/allColorScales.description: List of all available colormap names (including reversed versions).

api/variables/DEFAULT_SCALE.title: DEFAULT\_SCALE
api/variables/DEFAULT_SCALE.description: Default data scale range for visualization.

api/variables/DEFAULT_VERTICAL_EXAGGERAT.title: DEFAULT\_VERTICAL\_EXAGGERATION
api/variables/DEFAULT_VERTICAL_EXAGGERAT.description: Default vertical exaggeration factor for Zarr cube visualization.

api/variables/mercProj.title: mercProj
api/variables/mercProj.description: Global Web Mercator projection instance used for coordinate conversions.

data.title: Data Preparation
data.description: Zarr-Cesium works best when datasets are prepared with web visualization constraints in mind:

index.title: Introduction
index.description: High-performance CesiumJS providers for interactive 2D and 3D visualization of environmental and atmospheric data stored in Zarr.

providers/zarr-cube-provider.title: ZarrCubeProvider
providers/zarr-cube-provider.description: The ZarrCubeProvider renders 3D volumetric (cube) Zarr datasets as Cesium primitives.

providers/zarr-cube-velocity-provider.title: ZarrCubeVelocityProvider
providers/zarr-cube-velocity-provider.description: The ZarrCubeVelocityProvider loads and visualizes 3D vector fields (U, V components) from Zarr datasets as animated particle layers in Cesium using the WindLayer from cesium-wind-layer

providers/zarr-layer-provider.title: ZarrLayerProvider
providers/zarr-layer-provider.description: The ZarrLayerProvider allows you to render 2D raster data from Zarr datasets as a Cesium imagery layer.
